trans-unit.source: Hosts custom controls or Windows Forms controls.
trans-unit.target: Egendefinerte kontroller for verter eller Windows Forms-kontroller.

trans-unit.source: ToolStripControlHost is the abstract base class for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripControlHost er abstrakt basisklasse for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>

trans-unit.source: ToolStripControlHost can host other controls, including custom controls, in two ways: - Construct a ToolStripControlHost with a class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripControlHost kan være vert for andre kontroller, inkludert egendefinerte kontroller i to måter:-konstruere ToolStripControlHost med en klasse som er avledet fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: To fully access the hosted control and properties, you must cast the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.Control%2A> property back to the actual class it represents.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil fullstendig tilgang til vertsbaserte kontrollen og egenskapene, må du endre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.Control%2A>egenskapen til den faktiske klasse den representerer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.Control%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Extend ToolStripControlHost, and in the inherited class's default constructor, call the base class constructor passing a class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: -Utvide ToolStripControlHost, og kall basisklassen konstruktøren sending av en klasse som er avledet fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> i arvede klassen standardkonstruktør,

trans-unit.source: This option lets you wrap common control methods and properties for easy access in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Dette alternativet kan du utføre vanlige Kontrollmetoder og egenskaper for enkel tilgang i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Use the ToolStripControlHost class to host your customized controls or any other Windows Forms control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ToolStripControlHost-klassen som vert for tilpassede kontrollene eller en annen Windows Forms-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: To customize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, derive from ToolStripControlHost and create a custom implementation.
trans-unit.target: Tilpasse en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>avledes fra ToolStripControlHost og opprette en egendefinert implementering.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: You can override methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.OnSubscribeControlEvents%2A> to handle events raised by the hosted controls, and you can put custom functionality into properties to enhance the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre metoder som <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.OnSubscribeControlEvents%2A>å håndtere oppstå vertsbaserte kontroller, og du kan sette egendefinert funksjonalitet i Egenskaper for å forbedre den vertsbaserte kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.OnSubscribeControlEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref> class that hosts the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"> </xref> klassen som er vert for den angitte kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> hosted by this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> vert dette <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The control referred to by the c parameter is .
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen som refererer til den c parameteren er .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref> class that hosts the specified control and that has the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"> </xref> klassen som er vert for den angitte kontrollen, og som har det angitte navnet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> hosted by this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> vert dette <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsfargen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the background color of the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> som representerer bakgrunnsfargen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor*> property.
trans-unit.target: Standard er verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsbildet vises i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> that represents the image to display in the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> som representerer bildet som skal vises i bakgrunnen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image layout as defined in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ImageLayout" name="ImageLayout" href=""></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsfargen bildet oppsettet som er definert i den <xref uid="langword_csharp_ImageLayout" name="ImageLayout" href=""> </xref> opplisting.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>: - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> (default) - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>
trans-unit.target: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>: - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> (default) -<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control can be selected.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kontrollen kan velges.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control can be selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen kan velges; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted control causes and raises validation events on other controls when the hosted control receives focus.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den vertsbaserte kontrollen fører til og oppretter validering hendelser i andre kontroller når den vertsbaserte kontrollen mottar fokus.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosted control causes and raises validation events on other controls when the hosted control receives focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den vertsbaserte kontrollen fører til og oppretter validering hendelser i andre kontroller når den vertsbaserte kontrollen mottar fokus. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref> is hosting.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> som denne <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"> </xref> drifter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref> is hosting.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> som denne <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"> </xref> drifter.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the control on the form.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir justeringen for kontrollen i skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: Use the ControlAlign property to determine or define how hosted controls are to be laid out on the form.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ControlAlign-egenskapen til å bestemme eller definerer hvordan vertsbaserte kontroller som plasseres i skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ControlAlign property is set to a value that is not one of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ControlAlign er satt til en verdi som ikke er én av de <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the control.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et nytt tilgjengelighet-objekt for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the control.
trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter standardstørrelsen på kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The DefaultSize property represents the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of the control when it is initially created.
trans-unit.target: DefaultSize egenskapen representerer den <xref:System.Drawing.Size>kontrollens når den opprettes i utgangspunktet.</xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoSize%2A> is `true`, the control is sized automatically in accordance with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> orientation.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoSize%2A>er `true`, kontrollen endrer størrelse automatisk på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>retning.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can manually adjust the size of the control by setting its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoSize%2A> property value to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan justere størrelsen på kontrollen manuelt ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoSize%2A>verdien for egenskapen til `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In order to maintain better performance, you should not set the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of a control in its constructor.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For å beholde bedre ytelse, bør du ikke konfigurere den <xref:System.Drawing.Size>til en kontroll i sin konstruktør.</xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: The preferred method is to override the DefaultSize property.
trans-unit.target: Den foretrukne metoden er å overstyre DefaultSize-egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder ikke denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder ikke denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: The display style of the object.
trans-unit.target: Stilen for objektet.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen gjelder ikke denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen gjelder ikke denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig `Dispose` metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`Aktiverer den beskyttede `Dispose(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` parameteren er `true`, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>referanser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder ikke denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder ikke denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if double clicking is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis dobbeltklikke er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the parent control of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om overordnet kontrollere av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the parent control of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis overordnet kontroll av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> er aktivert, ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the hosted control is entered.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den vertsbaserte kontrollen er oppgitt.

trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsesbehandlingen representanter [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gives the focus to a control.
trans-unit.target: Gir fokus til en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control has input focus.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kontrollen er inndata fokus.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control has input focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen er inndata fokus. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font to be used on the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir skriften som skal brukes på den vertsbaserte kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> for the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> for den vertsbaserte kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir forgrunnsfargen på den vertsbaserte kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> representing the foreground color of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> som representerer forgrunnsfargen på den vertsbaserte kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a control can be fitted.
trans-unit.target: Henter størrelsen på et rektangulært område som en kontroll kan tilpasses.

trans-unit.source: The custom-sized area for a control.
trans-unit.target: Egendefinert størrelse området for en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: En i par med typen <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerer bredden og høyden på et rektangel.

trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den vertsbaserte kontrollen får fokus.

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an image on a ToolStripItem is automatically resized to fit in a container; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis et bilde for et ToolStripItem endrer størrelse automatisk for å få plass i en beholder; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The transparent color of the image.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnBoundsChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnBoundsChanged kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

trans-unit.source: Override the OnSubscribeControlEvents method to add or prevent the synchronizing of control events.
trans-unit.target: Overstyr OnSubscribeControlEvents-metoden for å legge til eller hindre synkronisering av kontrollhendelsene.

trans-unit.source: If you override and hook up events here, unhook them by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.OnUnsubscribeControlEvents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du overstyrer og koble hendelser her, unhook dem ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.OnUnsubscribeControlEvents%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.OnUnsubscribeControlEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: Behandler en nøkkel for kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, referert som representerer vinduet meldingen for å behandle.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> verdier som representerer nøkkelen til å behandle.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>i alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog key.
trans-unit.target: Behandler en dialogboksen nøkkel.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> verdier som representerer nøkkelen til å behandle.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed by the item; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis nøkkelen ble behandlet av elementet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: Behandler etikettens tegn.

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: Tegnet som brukes til å behandle.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tegnet ble behandlet som en mnemonisk av kontrollen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether control's elements are aligned to support locales using right-to-left fonts.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontrollen elementer justeres til støtter nasjonale innstillinger for å bruke høyre-mot-venstre skrifter.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the image is mirrored; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis bildet er speilet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the item is selected.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om elementet er valgt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> er valgte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> to the specified visible state.
trans-unit.target: Angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> til den angitte synlige tilstanden.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to make the ToolStripItem visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>foreta ToolStripItem synlige. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: En i par med typen <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerer bredden og høyden på et rektangel.
